mapper.sql: ID, BEL_PROCESS_NUM, ITEM_ID, ITEM_NAME, ITEMREVISION, CATIA_DIGIFAX, JT_DIGIFAX, CGR_DIGIFAX, CATIA_BLUEPRINT, CAD_BLUEPRINT, OTHERS,CHANGE_FLAG,CHANGE_EFFECT_TIME
mapper.insert: insert into HZ_TEMPITEMRECORD (ID, BEL_PROCESS_NUM, ITEM_ID, ITEM_NAME, ITEMREVISION, CATIA_DIGIFAX, JT_DIGIFAX, CGR_DIGIFAX, CATIA_BLUEPRINT, CAD_BLUEPRINT, OTHERS) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{belProcessNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemrevision,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{catiaDigifax,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{jtDigifax,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cgrDigifax,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{catiaBlueprint,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cadBlueprint,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{others,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update HZ_TEMPITEMRECORD set BEL_PROCESS_NUM = #{belProcessNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ITEM_ID = #{itemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ITEM_NAME = #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ITEMREVISION = #{itemrevision,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CATIA_DIGIFAX = #{catiaDigifax,jdbcType=INTEGER}, JT_DIGIFAX = #{jtDigifax,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CGR_DIGIFAX = #{cgrDigifax,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CATIA_BLUEPRINT = #{catiaBlueprint,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CAD_BLUEPRINT = #{cadBlueprint,jdbcType=INTEGER}, OTHERS = #{others,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
insert into HZ_TEMPITEMRECORD ( BEL_PROCESS_NUM, ITEM_ID, ITEM_NAME, ITEMREVISION, CATIA_DIGIFAX, JT_DIGIFAX, CGR_DIGIFAX, CATIA_BLUEPRINT, CAD_BLUEPRINT, OTHERS,CHANGE_FLAG)
SELECT #{item.belProcessNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.itemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.itemRevision,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.catiaDigifax,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.jtDigifax,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.cgrDigifax,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.catiaBlueprint,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.cadBlueprint,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.others,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.changeFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER} from DUAL
mapper.update: update HZ_TEMPITEMRECORD set CHANGE_EFFECT_TIME = sysdate where ITEM_ID = #{itemId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and CHANGE_FLAG=1
